meta_data.application-name: Prince Harry-Meghan Markle wedding: Fan celebrations around the world
meta_data.description: On the day of the royal wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, take a look at how the fans are celebrating.
